title: Angae Ippo Enna Seigiraai Lyrics Irumbu kudhirai song lyrics
stanzas:
Song : Angae Ippo Enna Seigiraai
Movie: Irumbu Kudhirai
Singer(s):Vijay Prakash,
Mugdha Hasabnis,M.M.Manasi 
Music: G.V.Prakash Kumar
Lyrics : Thamarai

hey anga enna panra
naa thoonga poren 
nee innum thoongalaya....

Angea ippo enna seigiraai
aadai maatri thoonga selgiraai..
ennai thoonga poga solgiraai...
pogiren oh....

ennavum peasalam
endrea or ennam thondrudhea.
un manam ennavo
thuzhaavi paarka thondrudhea...
oh... oh.... oh.... 

Angea ippo enna seigiraai
aadai maatri thoonga selgiraai..
ennai thoonga poga solgiraai...
pogiren oh....

Viral nuni anup-pidum
visaaranai, sugamea...
bathil mozhi varum varai
padum vazhi sugamea...

Oyvillayea viralgaluku..
nogindradhea nagam iduku..
aanalum en sugam irukku..
nenjea... sol....
oh... oh... oh...

Niram edhu.. manam edhu..
pidikkudhu unakku..
karum niram.. kadal manam..
pidikkumea enaku..

Naan kaalaiyil ezhundhadhumea
thaanagavea thalai thirumbum..
un seidhiyai manam virumbum..
yeano... yean.....
oh.... oh... oh....

Angea ippo enna seigiraai
aadai maatri thoonga selgiraai..
ennai thoonga poga solgiraai...
pogiren oh....

ennavum peasalam
endrea or ennam thondrudhea.
un manam ennavo
thuzhaavi paarka thondrudhea...
oh... oh.... oh....
category: Song:Angae Ippo Enna Seigiraai - Irumbu kudhirai
